item.title: Project Milestone 1: Getting started
item.description: Table of Contents Overview Life of an SQL Query Spatial data handling Introduction to Redbase Assigned Task Overview A vast majority of databases in use these days are relational, and popular implementations like Oracle, Microsoft SQL Server, MySQL and PostgreSQL dominate the database software market. A critical component of a database system is its index, a structure that allows efficient retrieval and join operations on the underlying tables.
